short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically switch to the mobile version of Wikipedia

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A very light-weight plugin that automatically redirects all Wikipedia requests to the equivalent mobile version.

The desktop version of WIkipedia is so wide, especially on big screens. It's far easier to read articles on the mobile version.
